DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective chart review and data abstraction will evaluate and quantify the effectiveness of a comprehensive weight management program. The hypothesis is that the program will positively affect weight, weight-related comorbidities and medication use.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Weight Management Program
DOC.criteria: Records of the first 40 study center participants who enrolled in the OPTIFAST Program from January 1, 2006 through June 30, 2006 Records of subjects who completed the active weight loss phase of the program Records where data is available through the transitional phase of the program Concurrent use of appetite suppressants or other weight loss medications
